mapper.select: select id, city_id, oder_id, service_type, amount, patientEscort_id, income, phone_number, start_time, end_time, patient_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag from order_list where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into order_list(city_id, oder_id, service_type, amount, patientEscort_id, income, phone_number, start_time, end_time, patient_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag) values (#{cityId}, #{oderId}, #{serviceType}, #{amount}, #{patientescortId}, #{income}, #{phoneNumber}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{patientId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{delFlag})

insert into order_list(city_id, oder_id, service_type, amount, patientEscort_id, income, phone_number, start_time, end_time, patient_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag) values
(#{entity.cityId}, #{entity.oderId}, #{entity.serviceType}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.patientescortId}, #{entity.income}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.patientId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag})

insert into order_list(city_id, oder_id, service_type, amount, patientEscort_id, income, phone_number, start_time, end_time, patient_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, status, del_flag) values
(#{entity.cityId}, #{entity.oderId}, #{entity.serviceType}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.patientescortId}, #{entity.income}, #{entity.phoneNumber}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.patientId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.delFlag})
on duplicate key update city_id = values(city_id), oder_id = values(oder_id), service_type = values(service_type), amount = values(amount), patientEscort_id = values(patientEscort_id), income = values(income), phone_number = values(phone_number), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), patient_id = values(patient_id), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), status = values(status), del_flag = values(del_flag)
mapper.update:
update order_list
city_id = #{cityId},
oder_id = #{oderId},
service_type = #{serviceType},
amount = #{amount},
patientEscort_id = #{patientescortId},
income = #{income},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
patient_id = #{patientId},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
status = #{status},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
